com.appliedrec.rxverid

Class RxVerIDHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.appliedrec.rxverid.RxVerIDHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.app.Application.ActivityLifecycleCallbacks

    public class RxVerIDHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.app.Application.ActivityLifecycleCallbacks
    Helper class that registers an instance of RxVerID for an application.
    Since:
    2.0.0

    • Method Summary

      • registerDefaultRxVerIDForApplication

        public static void registerDefaultRxVerIDForApplication(android.app.Application application)
        Register default instance of RxVerID for application
        Parameters:
        application - Application for which to register the RxVerID instance
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • registerRxVerIDForApplication

        public static void registerRxVerIDForApplication(RxVerID.Builder builder,
                                                 android.app.Application application)
        Register an instance of RxVerID for application
        Parameters:
        builder - Instance of RxVerID.Builder to be used to create the RxVerID instance. The context of the builder will be replaced with the application context.
        application - Application for which to register the RxVerID instance
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • getRxVerIDRegisteredForApplication

        public static RxVerID getRxVerIDRegisteredForApplication(android.app.Application application)
        Get an instance of RxVerID registered for application
        Parameters:
        application - Application for which the instance is registered
        Returns:
        RxVerID or null if no instance is registered for the application
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • unregisterRxVerIDFromApplication

        public static void unregisterRxVerIDFromApplication(android.app.Application application)
        Unregister RxVerID from application
        Parameters:
        application - Application from which to unregister RxVerID
        Since:
        2.0.0
